message: Operation 'delete-/crm-object-schemas/v3/schemas/{objectType}_archive' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context. Summary uses 'Delete' which is ambiguous - the operation actually archives the schema. Description mentions the prerequisite but lacks context about permanence and the relationship to object type. Improved summary clarifies 'archive' terminology consistent with API patterns, and enhanced description explains the permanent nature and object type relationship for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Deletes a schema. Any existing records of this schema must be deleted **first**. Otherwise this call will fail.
data.summary_suggestion: Archive a schema and its object type
data.description_suggestion: Archives (deletes) an object schema and its associated object type definition. Important: All existing records of this object type must be deleted before archiving the schema, otherwise the operation will fail. This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.
data.reasoning: Summary uses 'Delete' which is ambiguous - the operation actually archives the schema. Description mentions the prerequisite but lacks context about permanence and the relationship to object type. Improved summary clarifies 'archive' terminology consistent with API patterns, and enhanced description explains the permanent nature and object type relationship for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'patch-/crm-object-schemas/v3/schemas/{objectType}_update' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is acceptable, but description lacks specificity about what can be updated, that partial updates are supported, and what is returned. Enhanced description clarifies the request schema type, partial update support, and return value for improved AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Update the details for an existing object schema.
data.description_suggestion: Updates the details of an existing object schema using the ObjectTypeDefinitionPatch schema. Supports partial updates - only provided fields will be modified. Returns the updated object schema definition with all current properties and associations.
data.reasoning: Summary is acceptable, but description lacks specificity about what can be updated, that partial updates are supported, and what is returned. Enhanced description clarifies the request schema type, partial update support, and return value for improved AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'post-/crm-object-schemas/v3/schemas/{objectType}/associations_createAssociation' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description is somewhat vague about what an association enables and what is returned. Enhanced description clarifies the purpose of associations (enabling relationships between records) and specifies the return value (AssociationDefinition with identifier) for better AI agent understanding of the operation's effects.

data.current_description: Defines a new association between the primary schema's object type and other object types.
data.description_suggestion: Defines a new association between the specified object type and another object type. The association enables relationships between records of different object types. Returns the created AssociationDefinition with the association identifier and configuration details.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description is somewhat vague about what an association enables and what is returned. Enhanced description clarifies the purpose of associations (enabling relationships between records) and specifies the return value (AssociationDefinition with identifier) for better AI agent understanding of the operation's effects.

message: Operation 'delete-/crm-object-schemas/v3/schemas/{objectType}/associations/{associationIdentifier}_archiveAssociation' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context. Summary uses 'Remove' which is ambiguous - the operation archives the association. Description lacks context about what happens to existing relationships and how the association is identified. Improved summary clarifies 'archive' terminology, and enhanced description explains the distinction between archiving the association definition versus existing records, and clarifies the identification method for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Removes an existing association from a schema.
data.summary_suggestion: Archive an association between object types
data.description_suggestion: Archives (removes) an existing association between the specified object type and another object type. This prevents new relationships from being created between records of these types, but does not delete existing relationship records. The association is identified by the associationIdentifier parameter.
data.reasoning: Summary uses 'Remove' which is ambiguous - the operation archives the association. Description lacks context about what happens to existing relationships and how the association is identified. Improved summary clarifies 'archive' terminology, and enhanced description explains the distinction between archiving the association definition versus existing records, and clarifies the identification method for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'delete-/crm-object-schemas/v3/schemas/{objectType}_archive' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_side_effects, not_actionable. Original summary uses 'Delete' which is ambiguous (archive vs. permanent deletion). Description lacks clarity about permanence and side effects. Enhanced version clarifies the archival nature, prerequisite conditions, irreversibility, and return behavior for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Deletes a schema. Any existing records of this schema must be deleted **first**. Otherwise this call will fail.
data.summary_suggestion: Archive a schema and its object type
data.description_suggestion: Archives (deletes) an object schema and its associated object type definition. All existing records of this object type must be deleted before archiving the schema, otherwise the operation will fail. This is a permanent action that cannot be undone. Returns a confirmation of the archived schema.
data.reasoning: Original summary uses 'Delete' which is ambiguous (archive vs. permanent deletion). Description lacks clarity about permanence and side effects. Enhanced version clarifies the archival nature, prerequisite conditions, irreversibility, and return behavior for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Update the details for an existing object schema.

data.reasoning: Description lacks specificity about what 'details' can be updated and whether partial updates are supported. Enhanced description references the request schema, clarifies partial update support, and specifies the return value for improved AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Defines a new association between the primary schema's object type and other object types.
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new association definition between the specified object type and another object type. Accepts an AssociationDefinitionEgg containing the target object type and association metadata. Returns the created association definition with its unique identifier.
data.reasoning: Description uses vague language ('primary schema', 'other object types') without clarifying the input structure or return value. Enhanced version specifies the request schema, clarifies bidirectional relationship context, and describes the returned association identifier for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'delete-/crm-object-schemas/v3/schemas/{objectType}/associations/{associationIdentifier}_archiveAssociation' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_side_effects. Enhanced version specifies both required identifiers, clarifies that data is not affected (only the relationship definition), and confirms the return behavior for improved AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Removes an existing association from a schema.
data.summary_suggestion: Delete an association between object types
data.description_suggestion: Deletes an existing association definition between two object types. Requires both the object type ID and the association identifier. This operation removes the association relationship but does not affect existing records or their data. Returns confirmation of the deleted association.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Remove' is vague about the scope. Description lacks clarity about required parameters and side effects. Operation 'get-/crm-object-schemas/v3/schemas/{objectType}_getById' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details. Summary is adequate, but description is too minimal. It lacks clarity about the required input (object type ID parameter) and what specific schema details are returned. Enhanced description clarifies the input requirement and comprehensive output for better AI agent understanding.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a specific object schema by its object type ID. Returns the complete schema definition including properties, associations, and metadata for the specified object type.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate, but description is too minimal. It lacks clarity about the required input (object type ID parameter) and what specific schema details are returned. Enhanced description clarifies the input requirement and comprehensive output for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'delete-/crm-object-schemas/v3/schemas/{objectType}_archive' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context. Summary uses 'Delete' which is ambiguous - the operation actually archives the schema. Description mentions the prerequisite but lacks context about permanence and the relationship to object type. Improved summary clarifies 'archive' terminology consistent with API patterns, and enhanced description explains the permanent nature and object type relationship for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Deletes a schema. Any existing records of this schema must be deleted **first**. Otherwise this call will fail.
data.summary_suggestion: Archive a schema and its object type
data.description_suggestion: Archives (deletes) an object schema and its associated object type definition. Important: All existing records of this object type must be deleted before archiving the schema, otherwise the operation will fail. This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.
data.reasoning: Summary uses 'Delete' which is ambiguous - the operation actually archives the schema. Description mentions the prerequisite but lacks context about permanence and the relationship to object type. Improved summary clarifies 'archive' terminology consistent with API patterns, and enhanced description explains the permanent nature and object type relationship for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'patch-/crm-object-schemas/v3/schemas/{objectType}_update' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is acceptable, but description lacks specificity about what can be updated, that partial updates are supported, and what is returned. Enhanced description clarifies the request schema type, partial update support, and return value for improved AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Update the details for an existing object schema.
data.description_suggestion: Updates the details of an existing object schema using the ObjectTypeDefinitionPatch schema. Supports partial updates - only provided fields will be modified. Returns the updated object schema definition with all current properties and associations.
data.reasoning: Summary is acceptable, but description lacks specificity about what can be updated, that partial updates are supported, and what is returned. Enhanced description clarifies the request schema type, partial update support, and return value for improved AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'post-/crm-object-schemas/v3/schemas/{objectType}/associations_createAssociation' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description is somewhat vague about what an association enables and what is returned. Enhanced description clarifies the purpose of associations (enabling relationships between records) and specifies the return value (AssociationDefinition with identifier) for better AI agent understanding of the operation's effects.

data.current_description: Defines a new association between the primary schema's object type and other object types.
data.description_suggestion: Defines a new association between the specified object type and another object type. The association enables relationships between records of different object types. Returns the created AssociationDefinition with the association identifier and configuration details.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description is somewhat vague about what an association enables and what is returned. Enhanced description clarifies the purpose of associations (enabling relationships between records) and specifies the return value (AssociationDefinition with identifier) for better AI agent understanding of the operation's effects.

message: Operation 'delete-/crm-object-schemas/v3/schemas/{objectType}/associations/{associationIdentifier}_archiveAssociation' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context. Summary uses 'Remove' which is ambiguous - the operation archives the association. Description lacks context about what happens to existing relationships and how the association is identified. Improved summary clarifies 'archive' terminology, and enhanced description explains the distinction between archiving the association definition versus existing records, and clarifies the identification method for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Removes an existing association from a schema.
data.summary_suggestion: Archive an association between object types
data.description_suggestion: Archives (removes) an existing association between the specified object type and another object type. This prevents new relationships from being created between records of these types, but does not delete existing relationship records. The association is identified by the associationIdentifier parameter.
data.reasoning: Summary uses 'Remove' which is ambiguous - the operation archives the association. Description lacks context about what happens to existing relationships and how the association is identified. Improved summary clarifies 'archive' terminology, and enhanced description explains the distinction between archiving the association definition versus existing records, and clarifies the identification method for better AI agent understanding.
